mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT count(Id) FROM member.wechat_user_info w WHERE w.subscribe = 1 AND w.`status` = 1 ) '可收到微信推送消息人数', ( SELECT count(Id) FROM member.wechat_user_info w WHERE w.subscribe = 0 AND w.`status` = 2 ) '微信登录绑定人数', ( SELECT count(Id) FROM member.wechat_user_info w WHERE w.subscribe = 0 AND w.`status` = 1 ) '用户取消关注微信公众号,但已绑定', ( SELECT count(id) FROM member.wechat_user_info ORDER BY create_time DESC ) '可使用微信登录的人数', ( SELECT count(id) FROM member.wechat_template_push_msg WHERE to_days(create_time) = to_days(now()) ) '查询当天微信消息推送的数量';

SELECT t.title, count(m.template_id) nums FROM member.wechat_template_push t LEFT JOIN member.wechat_template_push_msg m ON t.template_id = m.template_id WHERE to_days(m.create_time) = to_days(now()) GROUP BY t.title;
